sentence: [You follow the masked woman, unsure who else may be able to help you in this strange place. You catch up to her in a small forest grove.]

author: masked woman
sentence: I told you to stop following me!

author: masked woman
sentence: It's weird, and obnoxious and dangerous, and just... distasteful.

author: masked woman
sentence: You could've gotten us into some deep-

author: masked woman
sentence: Ugh, let me take this off so i can yell at you better

author: unmasked woman
sentence: Wait... what happened to your face? Looks like something cut your cheek.

author: unmasked woman
sentence: Did you get that while following me?

author: unmasked woman
sentence: We need yo clean it before it gets infected!
responses: Mybe you could come closer and examine it, Doc-

author: unmasked woman
sentence: I-I mean- You deserve it for chasing after me like child!

author: unmasked woman
sentence: Who even cares about your face? I don't care about your face!
responses: You're the onwe who abandoned me out there!

author: unmasked woman
sentence: I didn't mean- You've got the wrong idea!

author: unmasked woman
sentence: I should just kill you and let the animals eat you.

author: unmasked woman
sentence: Mybe then it'll finally come out...

author: unmasked woman
sentence: You've given me a great idea...

author: unmasked woman
sentence: You see, I'm tracking something...

author: unmasked woman
sentence: A demon.

author: unmasked woman
sentence: Normally, I wouldn't ask    a stranger for help...

author: unmasked woman
sentence: Especially not an adult baby like you...

author: unmasked woman
sentence: But it's... important.

author: unmasked woman
sentence: This demon killed my parents. Slaughtered them in the night

author: unmasked woman
sentence: I found them.... pieces of them... scattered throughout our home.

author: unmasked woman
sentence: I've tracked the demon this far...

author: unmasked woman
sentence: I mean to kill it. And you're going to help me
responses: What do you expect me to do?
Oh, now you want my help?

author: unmasked woman
sentence: Just hear me out.

author: unmasked woman
sentence: This demon is drawn to blood. But is's particular... it won't come out for just any amount of the stuff.

author: unmasked woman
sentence: And I haven't been able to find anything larger than a rabbit arround here.

author: unmasked woman
sentence: Buy you're here, and you've already got a cut...

author: unmasked woman
sentence: Yes.

author: unmasked woman
sentence: Oh yes.
responses: YOU WANT ME TO BE BAIT?

author: unmasked woman
sentence: Listen, you're lost. You said so yourself. That's why you've been following me right?

author: unmasked woman
sentence: Help me, and I'll help you get out of there- to wherever you want.

author: unmasked woman
sentence: It's not like you're in position to refuse.

author: unmasked woman
sentence: What are you going to do if I leave you here? Find your own way back?

author: unmasked woman
sentence: With a demon on the loose?

author: unmasked woman
sentence: Yeah, I figured.

author: unmasked woman
sentence: It's settled then. You help me, I help you.

author: vayne
sentence: I'm Vayne. See? We're establishing trust already. You should feel confident that you won't be violent torn apart.
responses: Great. Let's go kill this thing.
What was that last part again?

author: vayne
sentence: Likewise.

author: vayne
sentence: After you.

author: vayne
sentence: Don't worry about it.

author: vayne
sentence: Now follow my lead. Touch my ribbon and lose the hand.
